name: Skyward Blade
effect: Crit Rate increased by {0}%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by {1}% for 12s.
description: A sword of a knight that symbolizes the reclaimed honor of the Stormterror. The blessings of the God of Winds rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.
